PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-02162018-03-06,  ,  PCH,  , 
ActPublic Service Labour Relations Act
SubjectNational Film Board - Canadian Union of Public Employees, Local 2656 ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder Approving of the ENTRY BY THE NATIONAL FILM BOARD, INTO A COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the CANADIAN UNION OF PUBLIC EMPLOYEES, LOCAL 2656, in respect of its employees in the Administrative Support category and the Operational category for a term of four (4) years; it comes into force on July 1, 2014 and expires on June 30, 2018.
AttachmentsAttachment
